Generated Narrative: StructureDefinition artifactassessment-content

NameFlagsCard.TypeDescription & Constraints
Extension 0..*ExtensionComment, classifier, or rating content
Slices for extension Content/Rules for all slices
extension:informationType 0..1Extensioncomment | classifier | rating | container | response | change-request
url 1..1uri"informationType"
value[x] 0..1codeValue of extension
Binding: ArtifactAssessmentInformationType (required): The type of information contained in a component of an artifact assessment.

extension:summary 0..1ExtensionBrief summary of the content
url 1..1uri"summary"
value[x] 0..1markdownValue of extension
extension:type 0..1ExtensionIndicates what type of content this component represents
url 1..1uri"type"
value[x] 0..1CodeableConceptValue of extension
Binding: EvidenceCertaintyType (example)
extension:classifier 0..*ExtensionRating, classifier, or assessment
url 1..1uri"classifier"
value[x] 0..1CodeableConceptValue of extension
Binding: EvidenceCertaintyRating (example)
extension:quantity 0..1ExtensionQuantitative rating
url 1..1uri"quantity"
value[x] 0..1QuantityValue of extension
extension:author 0..1ExtensionWho authored the content
url 1..1uri"author"
value[x] 0..1Reference(Patient | Practitioner | PractitionerRole | Organization | Device)Value of extension
extension:path 0..*ExtensionWhat the comment is directed to
url 1..1uri"path"
value[x] 0..1uriValue of extension
extension:relatedArtifact 0..*ExtensionAdditional information
url 1..1uri"relatedArtifact"
value[x] 0..1RelatedArtifactValue of extension
extension:freeToShare 0..1ExtensionAcceptable to publicly share the resource content
url 1..1uri"freeToShare"
value[x] 0..1booleanValue of extension
extension:component 0..*ExtensionContained content
url 1..1uri"component"
value[x] 0..1See extension (Extension)Value of extension
url 1..1uri"http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/artifactassessment-content"

Documentation for this format

name: ArtifactAssessmentContent
title: Artifact Assessment Content
description: A Content containing additional documentation, a review Content, usage guidance, or other relevant information from a particular user.

element.definition: Content containing A component comment, classifier, or rating of the artifact.

constraint.human: All FHIR elements must have a @value or children
Must have either extensions or value[x], not both

element.definition: Unique id for the element within a resource (for internal references). This may be any string value that does not contain spaces.
